Package org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.utils

A series of utility classes for the RESTv2 handlers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    XmlSerializable
    An interface for POJOs used in XML (de)serialization.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonUtils
    A series of utility methods for serializing and deserializing JSON.
    RestUtils
    A series of utility methods shared by all handlers of the RESTv2 API.
    XmlSerializable.Aliases
    A container for a list of aliases for XML (de)serialisation purposes.
    XmlSerializable.Aliases.AliasEntry
    A POJO representing an alias entry for XML (de)serialisation purposes.
    XmlSerializable.Businesses
    A POJO representing a list of business ids for XML (de)serialisation purposes.
    XmlSerializable.Hosts
    A container for a list of hosts for XML (de)serialisation purposes.
    XmlSerializable.Roles
    A container for a list of roles for XML (de)serialisation purposes.
    XmlSerializable.Roles.RoleEntry
    A POJO representing a role entry for XML (de)serialisation purposes.
    XmlSerializable.Rules
    A container for a list of rules for XML (de)serialisation purposes.
    XmlSerializable.Rules.Tasks
    A POJO representing a list of tasks for XML (de)serialisation purposes.
    XmlSerializable.Transfers
    container for a list of transfers for XML (de)serialisation purposes.
    XmlUtils
    A series of utility methods for serializing and deserializing XML.

Package org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.utils Description

A series of utility classes for the RESTv2 handlers.
